title: Implemented healthcheck in quarkus application using smallrye- /myapp/health-ui/ is not working on demo/Approval environment
body:
### Describe the bug

Hello Team, 

I have this dependency in my pom.xml 
<dependency>
        <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
        <artifactId>quarkus-smallrye-health</artifactId>
        <version>3.11.0</version>
    </dependency>
    
    
  Locally if I enter this url : http://localhost:8080/myapp/health - it is working fine
                                          http://localhost:8080/myapp/health-ui  - it is also working fine.
                                          
  but when we are deploying our application on environment- **/myapp/health-ui** is not working. we are getting default index.html response - 
  
  SmallRye Health Health UI
     * [settings.png]

     *

Settings

   (BUTTON) Ã—
   Title ____________________
   Health URL ____________________
   Poll [off_____________]
   [1]Save
   Loading health probes...

References

   Visible links:
   1. javascript: changeSettings()

   Hidden links:
   3. javascript: loadHealthData()
   
 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   In application.properties file we have added below properties as well 
   
 quarkus.health.extensions.enabled=false
quarkus.smallrye-health.ui.enable=true
quarkus.smallrye-health.ui.always-include=true
quarkus.smallrye-health.root-path=/myapp/health
quarkus.smallrye-health.ui.root-path=/myapp/health-ui



can you please check. why the UI url is not working on environment

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.16.7.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn

### Additional information

_No response_
